hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT CONTACT_ID, CREATED_BY, TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS CREATION_DATE, IS_PRIMARY, LAST_UPDATED_BY, TO_CHAR(LAST_UPDATE_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS LAST_UPDATE_DATE, LINK_ID, PERSON_ID FROM HP_COMMS_PERSON_LINK WHERE 1 = 1 ${auto_fill} ${frameworkGeneratedWhere} ${frameworkGeneratedOrderBy}

INSERT INTO HP_COMMS_PERSON_LINK ( CONTACT_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATION_DATE, IS_PRIMARY, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, LINK_ID, PERSON_ID ) VALUES ( ${CONTACT_ID}, ${CREATED_BY}, ${CREATION_DATE}, ${IS_PRIMARY}, ${LAST_UPDATED_BY}, ${LAST_UPDATE_DATE}, ${LINK_ID}, ${PERSON_ID} )

UPDATE HP_COMMS_PERSON_LINK SET CONTACT_ID = ${CONTACT_ID}, CREATED_BY = ${CREATED_BY}, CREATION_DATE = ${CREATION_DATE}, IS_PRIMARY = ${IS_PRIMARY}, LAST_UPDATED_BY = ${LAST_UPDATED_BY}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = ${LAST_UPDATE_DATE}, LINK_ID = ${LINK_ID}, PERSON_ID = ${PERSON_ID} WHERE 1 = 1 ${frameworkGeneratedWhere}
